last_episode_to_air.name: Burn the Ships
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s win or stay home as the Eagles’ biggest rivals stand in the way of a division title and Carson Wentz’s first postseason appearance.

name: All or Nothing
overview: For the first time in history, Amazon and NFL Films present an unprecedented inside look at the lives of players, coaches and owners of a franchise over the course of an entire NFL season. Witness the real life, behind the scenes journey on the field, off the field, and everything in between.

seasons.name: A Season with the Arizona Cardinals
seasons.overview: Season one presents an unprecedented look at the lives of players, coaches and owners of the Arizona Cardinals over an entire NFL season. Witness the real life, behind the scenes journey with Head coach Bruce Arians, President Michael Bidwill, General Manager Steve Keim, and Pro Bowlers Carson Palmer, Larry Fitzgerald, Patrick Peterson, and Tyrann Mathieu.

seasons.name: A Season with the Los Angeles Rams
seasons.overview: Season two tracks the Los Angeles Rams through a year unlike any other, from the moment the team announces its relocation back home to Los Angeles to the hiring of new head coach Sean McVay and his first days on the job.

seasons.name: The Dallas Cowboys
seasons.overview: Season 3 follows the Dallas Cowboys through their tumultuous 2017 campaign, which they enter with Super Bowl aspirations and exit one game short of the playoffs after a roller-coaster of controversy and emotion.

seasons.name: Carolina Panthers
seasons.overview: Just three years removed from his MVP season, quarterback Cam Newton remains the charismatic star around whom the Panthers revolve. His cast of teammates includes dynamic running back Christian McCaffrey and perennial All-Pro linebacker Luke Kuechly, along with a mix of talented rookies hungry to prove themselves and several veterans who know this season might be their last.

seasons.name: The Philadelphia Eagles
seasons.overview: One season has passed since Philadelphia’s first Super Bowl championship and expectations are once again soaring. Carson Wentz, Pro Bowl tight end Zach Ertz and defensive stalwarts Malcolm Jenkins, Fletcher Cox, and Brandon Graham lead a loaded roster intent on returning the Lombardi Trophy to Philadelphia, where the Eagles are more than just a football team-they’re a way of life.

episodes.name: The Cardinal Rules
episodes.overview: Bruce Arians and the Arizona Cardinals begin the 2015 season on a mission to win the Super Bowl as quarterback Carson Palmer returns from a knee injury to join forces with veteran receiver Larry Fitzgerald and a pair of new running backs.

episodes.name: Fog
episodes.overview: The Cardinals face adversity for the first time and call for reinforcements as they prepare for a road trip that will take them to a remote mountain resort and a visit to Coach Bruce Arians's former team, the Pittsburgh Steelers.

episodes.name: The Penthouse
episodes.overview: As the middle of the season and a needed bye week approach, safety Tyrann Mathieu and the Cardinals have their eyes on the team they must conquer: the two-time defending NFC champion Seattle Seahawks.

episodes.name: The Wheel
episodes.overview: Cornerback Patrick Peterson prepares for a major life change as quarterback Carson Palmer meets his former team the Cincinnati Bengals and the Cardinals call upon an old rival to help navigate the tough NFC West.

episodes.name: December Football
episodes.overview: Behind star rookie running back David Johnson the Cardinals enter the most important stretch of the regular season healthy and on a roll. But in the NFL's cruelest month everything can change in an instant.

episodes.name: Endings and Beginnings
episodes.overview: The Cardinals try to overcome the devastating loss of Tyrann Mathieu as two of the NFC's best, the Green Bay Packers and the Seattle Seahawks, visit Arizona.

episodes.name: The New Season
episodes.overview: The Cardinals play host to the one of the wildest playoff games in NFL history as Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers return to the desert seeking revenge for a Week 16 blowout.

episodes.name: All or Nothing?
episodes.overview: With a trip to the Super Bowl on the line, the Cardinals travel to Carolina to face Cam Newton and the Panthers in the NFC Championship Game.

1.name: A Season with the Arizona Cardinals
1.overview: Season one presents an unprecedented look at the lives of players, coaches and owners of the Arizona Cardinals over an entire NFL season. Witness the real life, behind the scenes journey with Head coach Bruce Arians, President Michael Bidwill, General Manager Steve Keim, and Pro Bowlers Carson Palmer, Larry Fitzgerald, Patrick Peterson, and Tyrann Mathieu.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.overview: Jeff Fisher and the Rams make the big move from St. Louis to Los Angeles, and the big move up in the Draft to select quarterback Jared Goff, who joins stars Todd Gurley and Aaron Donald as the Rams begin their 2016 season trying to win over a city and a fan base.

episodes.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
episodes.overview: The Rams celebrate their first home game at the LA Memorial Coliseum in nearly 40 years, before travelling to Tampa to face the Buccaneers in a high-scoring affair interrupted by a lightning storm.

episodes.name: Victory Waffles
episodes.overview: In his bid to hold off rookie Jared Goff, veteran quarterback Case Keenum looks to keep the Rams on a roll as they face their division rivals, the Arizona Cardinals.

episodes.name: The Longest Road Trip
episodes.overview: Injuries begin to mount as the NFL's road warriors pack up for a two-week, 11,000-mile road trip, first to Detroit to take on the Lions and then to England to face the Giants - a trip that gives the players and their families a chance to see the sights and sounds of London.

episodes.name: The Great Debate
episodes.overview: Star defensive tackle Aaron Donald leads a dominant defense against the Panthers, Jets and Dolphins, but poor offensive play and growing criticism force the team to make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Winds of Change
episodes.overview: It's Jared Goff time in LA, as the Rams try to salvage their season... and their head coach's job.

episodes.name: Proud to be a Ram
episodes.overview: After being named Interim Head Coach, John Fassel leads the Rams through the final weeks of the season and into an uncertain future.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: The Rams hire a new head coach, Sean McVay, and embark on preparations for the NFL Draft and the 2017 season.

2.name: A Season with the Los Angeles Rams
2.overview: Season two tracks the Los Angeles Rams through a year unlike any other, from the moment the team announces its relocation back home to Los Angeles to the hiring of new head coach Sean McVay and his first days on the job.

episodes.name: The Team You Want to Coach
episodes.overview: The Cowboys season begins with the highest ambitions and an early sign that it may not go as planned.

episodes.name: D is for Distraction
episodes.overview: An unexpected surprise interrupts the Cowboys attempt to rebound from defeat in Denver.

episodes.name: The Writing on the Wall
episodes.overview: The Cowboys face an early crossroads in their season as a long-time nemesis comes to town.

episodes.name: Happy Halloween
episodes.overview: It's a good time to be in Dallas: the team is rolling and Tony Romo is coming home for his first Cowboys game as a broadcaster.

episodes.name: What We Want To Be
episodes.overview: The suspension of Ezekiel Elliott and several key injuries send the Cowboys in the wrong direction.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving in Dallas
episodes.overview: As their traditional holiday home game approaches, the Cowboys are reeling but determined to stick together.

episodes.name: The Edge
episodes.overview: Desperate to keep their season alive, Dak Prescott and the Cowboys catch fire down the stretch.

episodes.name: Highs and Lows
episodes.overview: Ezekiel Elliott returns from his suspension as the Cowboys gear up for one final run at a playoff berth.

3.name: The Dallas Cowboys
3.overview: Season 3 follows the Dallas Cowboys through their tumultuous 2017 campaign, which they enter with Super Bowl aspirations and exit one game short of the playoffs after a roller-coaster of controversy and emotion.

episodes.name: Sweet Carolina
episodes.overview: Expectations are high for Cam Newton and the Panthers as they begin a season that could be the last for some of Carolina's most celebrated players.

episodes.name: Get Better
episodes.overview: An approaching hurricane is just one storm Carolina must weather as injuries and inconsistency force new faces to step up.

episodes.name: Special Times
episodes.overview: Carolina makes a controversial addition to the defense while Ron Rivera ensures special teams gets their share of the spotlight.

episodes.name: Look Good, Play Good
episodes.overview: Cam Newton faces off against an old teammate and tailors a game plan for his trip to Philadelphia.

episodes.name: It Happens
episodes.overview: Carolina is cruising midway through the season, but all is not right with Cam Newton as the Panthers take on Pittsburgh in prime time.

episodes.name: That's How Football Works
episodes.overview: After a tough road trip, Cam Newton consoles a struggling teammate while seeking his own redemption against Seattle.

episodes.name: Vicious Cycle
episodes.overview: In need of wins to remain in the playoff hunt, the Panthers' hopes hinge on the health of their quarterback.

episodes.name: Retire, Repair, Rebuild
episodes.overview: A quarterback decision precludes final farewells and a shift in focus toward the Panthers' future.

4.name: Carolina Panthers
4.overview: Just three years removed from his MVP season, quarterback Cam Newton remains the charismatic star around whom the Panthers revolve. His cast of teammates includes dynamic running back Christian McCaffrey and perennial All-Pro linebacker Luke Kuechly, along with a mix of talented rookies hungry to prove themselves and several veterans who know this season might be their last.

episodes.name: Fly Eagles Fly
episodes.overview: The start of the Eagles’ 2019 season is marked by high expectations and the return of a Philadelphia fan favorite.

episodes.name: The Noise
episodes.overview: Plagued by injuries and public criticism, the Eagles head to Green Bay for a primetime game against the Packers.

episodes.name: Not for Suckers
episodes.overview: Philly’s defense brings in much-needed help as the Eagles begin a three-game road stretch that could define the rest of the season.

episodes.name: Beat Dallas
episodes.overview: “Dallas Week” is only part of the Sports - Football in Philadelphia as an Eagles captain comes under fire from a former teammate.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: The return of a key playmaker gives the Eagles a spark before they break for a bye week and prepare for the Patriots.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: As injuries and losses continue to mount, the entire Eagles organization tries to provide answers for a season that has yet to meet expectations.

episodes.name: All of Us
episodes.overview: With four games to go, Philadelphia turns to an unknown cast of backups to keep their dwindling playoff hopes alive.

episodes.name: Burn the Ships
episodes.overview: It’s win or stay home as the Eagles’ biggest rivals stand in the way of a division title and Carson Wentz’s first postseason appearance.

5.name: The Philadelphia Eagles
5.overview: One season has passed since Philadelphia’s first Super Bowl championship and expectations are once again soaring. Carson Wentz, Pro Bowl tight end Zach Ertz and defensive stalwarts Malcolm Jenkins, Fletcher Cox, and Brandon Graham lead a loaded roster intent on returning the Lombardi Trophy to Philadelphia, where the Eagles are more than just a football team-they’re a way of life.
